{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=NVG578 |revision= |series= |is_manuf=No |type=fiber gateway, wireless router |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM68580 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |ram1=256 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP+, XFP |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM84880 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=10G |wan_ports=1 |flags=GPON, XG-PON, XGS-PON, Link Aggregation, TR-069, Docker, Bluetooth LE, ZigBee, Z-Wave, VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax }} {{TagLine|NVG578 10G GPON Gateways}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/nvg578-gpon-gateways/}} {{see also|Arris NVG595|Arris NVG599|Arris NVG448B}}
;Variants: * NVG578S: XGS-PON Symmetrical 10/10 – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi * NVG578: XG-PON Asymmetrical 10/2.5 – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi * NVG578L: 2.5GPON – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi
Product literature makes it sound like this device is optionally dual-band or :tri-band for all three variants. 802.11ax support may be optional as well.
*Link speed: 2488/9953 Mbps
===Models=== :;[[Arris]] *[[Arris NVG548]] • BCM63158 (ARM), BCM43684/BCM4366E *[[Arris NVG558]] • BCM62118 (ARM)/BCM63159, BCM43684/BCM4366E *[[Arris NVG578]] • BCM68580 (ARM), BCM43684/BCM4366E <!-- :;[[Broadcom]] SoC *BCM62118 (ARM), BCM68580 (ARM) *BCM63138 (MIPS), BCM63148 (MIPS) *BCM63158 (ARM), BCM63168 (MIPS) *BCM6361, BCM6368, BCM63281, BCM6819 *Wireless: BCM43684, BCM4366, BCM43602 *LAN: BCM53125, BCM53134, BCM84880 (10G) --> ===See also=== *[[Salt Fiber Box]] • BCM68580 (ARM), BCM4366E, BCM84881 *[[Sagemcom F@ST 5650]] • BCM68500 (ARM), BCM43217
